summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the north side of East Madison Street, in the City of Seattle, from the west margin of Twenty-third Avenue North to the east margin of Twenty-ninth Avenue North, by planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 1367 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
